language.fullpath: Programming Language :: Project is a programming language

name: New Programming Language
short_description:
I am designing a new programming language, based on the idea of Unix pipes (well I think it's new that an entire language is based upon pipes).

Will provide automatic/implicit parallelization, distributed processing, fault-tolerance and IO.

Will have a strict, static object-based type system combined with the ease of use of a non-strict, dynamically typed system.  This will be achieved by a method of just-in-time static compilation that will enable dynamic binding of methods/functions but with the speed of execution of static compilation.

The code will be both textual *and* graphical/diagrammatical, and there will be direct & unambiguous one-to-one correspondence between the two forms.
